biotools.summary: Gene prediction program for small viral genomes in support of high throughput feature prediction and annotation. Identified genome-specific features include frame shifts, ribosomal slippage, RNA editing, stop codon read-through, overlapping genes, embedded genes, and mature peptide cleavage sites.

bioschemas.name: VIGOR
